title: Wanderer
description: A soul without a home, always moving and never settling.

title: Noble
description: Born of privilege, with wealth and influence at your fingertips.
bonus: Bonus: +2 to Charisma, Access to Noble Estates.

title: Outlaw
description: A life on the edge, living by your own rules and outside the law.
bonus: Bonus: +1 to Combat Skills, Discounts on Black Market Goods.

title: Bandit
description: Living on the fringes of society, taking what you need by force.
bonus: Bonus: +1 to Combat Skills, +1 to Stealth.

title: Amazon
description: A fierce warrior of a matriarchal society.
bonus: Bonus: +2 to Strength, +1 to Combat Skills.

title: Arcanist
description: A master of the mystical arts, drawn to the secrets of magic.
bonus: Bonus: +2 to Magic Skills, Access to Arcane Libraries.

title: Technomancer
description: A visionary of technology, fusing machines with arcane principles.
bonus: Bonus: +2 to Technology Skills, Access to Advanced Workshops.

title: Synthesist
description: A rare blend of magic and technology, uniting the best of both worlds.
bonus: Bonus: +1 to Magic and Technology Skills, Access to Hybrid Crafting.

title: Mastermind
description: A calculating genius combining dark magic and advanced technology to create minions.
bonus: Bonus: +3 to Minion Control, Access to Unique Constructs.

title: Ex-Miner
description: A tough former miner with expertise in metallurgy and blacksmithing.
bonus: Bonus: +2 to Mining Efficiency, Access to Advanced Smithing Techniques.

title: Demolitionist
description: A specialist in blowing things up, skilled with firearms and explosive magitech.
bonus: Bonus: +2 to Explosives Damage, Access to Demolition Equipment.
